item.name: TID
item.dsc: Identification of Conflict Categories Definition Table

item.name: AI1
item.dsc: Aircraft Identifier (in 7 Characters) of Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

item.name: MODE3A
item.dsc: Mode-3/A Code (Converted Into Octal Representation) of Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

item.name: CPW
item.dsc: Predicted Conflict Position Target 1 in WGS-84 Coordinates

item.name: CPC
item.dsc: Predicted Conflict Position for the Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

item.name: TT1
item.dsc: Time to Runway Threshold for First Approaching Aircraft in a RIMCA

item.name: DT1
item.dsc: Distance to Runway Threshold for Aircraft 1 Involved in a RIMCA

item.name: AC1
item.dsc: Characteristics of Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

item.name: GATOAT
item.dsc: Identification of Conflict Categories Definition Table

item.name: MS1
item.dsc: Aircraft Identification Downloaded from Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict If Equipped with a Mode-S Transponder

item.name: FP1
item.dsc: Number of the Flight Plan Correlated to Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

item.name: CF1
item.dsc: Cleared Flight Level for Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict
